stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes the use and resolution of the chordal seventh in measure 4, beats 2â€“3 ?

features.html: The following question is based on the excerpt below.

choicesHtml: The chordal seventh is in the soprano and resolves correctly in measure 5 by common tone.
The chordal seventh is in the alto and resolves correctly in measure 5 by downward stepwise motion.
The chordal seventh is in the tenor and resolves correctly in measure 5 by downward stepwise motion.
The chordal seventh is in the bass and does not resolve correctly.
